name: 4x4 Extreme Offroad Adventure Racing
description:
4х4 offroad Adventure suggest you to try what rescuer feels.
Vacation - what can be better? But suddenly vacation can turn into nightmare.
Your daughter left for a holiday and was lost in disaster area.
You as her father must find and rescue her. Visit cities that were affected by the disaster. Help other civilians for information of your daughter's possible location. Wade through swamps, scarps, dangerous mountain roads and make all the best to pull her from that nightmare.
Features:
- Interesting and fascinating story
- Additional quests that do not let you get bored
- Modern graphics
- Rapidly changing weather conditions
- Large set of cars
- Realistic physics of the car behavior on the road
- Day and night changes
